thread.section_title: Hotel Manfredi Suite in Rome - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Small decent hotel
thread.title_full: Small decent hotel - Review of Hotel Manfredi Suite in Rome, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: phatut
title: Small decent hotel
text:
We stayed in a small room situated next to the reception - which made it noisy as one could hear the incoming guests etc.
Standard buffet breakfast.
The location is very central (not recommended in Rome) but on a relatively quiet, side street.
Bathroom is very small, not allowing a person above 170cm to shower standing straight. Toilet seat also very small and not standard in shape (round not oval).
